description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	In charge of supervisor and coordination at site
              
              -	Making detail plan for construction progress
              
              -	Making daily report about the actual conditions at site
              
              -	Making minutes at site, inspection sheet…
              
              -	Making bill of quantity for project
              
              -	Supervising sub-constructor
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Graduated from University of Construction / or University of Architect, Major in Civil Engineering
              
              -	Have at least 3 years of experience in site engineer position
              
              -	Good communication and writing of English
              
              -	Good computer skill: MS. Office, Auto Cad
              
              -	Willing to work under hard pressure, be able to work in local provinces
              
              -	Experience working for Japanese contractor is preferable
              

              BENEFIT
              
              -	Competitive salary
              

              NOTE:
              
              -  Preparing full application documents when applying for us
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc

Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Competitive salary
